jokes.question: Why did the duck go to the doctor?
Why did the bee become a singer?
Why did the skeleton go to the party alone?
jokes.answer: He had no body to go with.

jokes.question: Why don't scientists trust stairs?
jokes.answer: Because they're always up to something.

jokes.question: Why did the tomato turn red?
jokes.answer: Because it saw the salad dressing!

jokes.question: Why did the bicycle fall over?
Why don't eggs tell jokes?
Why did the golfer bring two pairs of pants?
jokes.answer: In case he got a hole in one.

jokes.question: Why don't programmers like to write comments?
jokes.answer: Because the code should speak for itself.

jokes.question: Why did the developer disassemble the desk lamp?
jokes.answer: Because the manual said to debug.

jokes.question: Why was the function looking for an argument?
Why do Python developers prefer snakes?
jokes.answer: Because they are flexible with their syntax.

jokes.question: Why is the algorithm so persistent?
jokes.answer: Because it always wants to find a solution.

jokes.question: Why does Python enjoy the cold?
jokes.answer: Because there's plenty of room for its modules in the freezer.

jokes.question: Why did the coder get kicked out of the casino?
Why do programmers hate nature?
jokes.answer: Because it has too many bugs.

jokes.question: Why do Java developers wear glasses?
Why was the computer cold at work?
How many programmers does it take to change a light bulb?
Why did the programmer quit his job?
What do you call a programmer from Finland?
Why is geometry never sad?
jokes.answer: Because it always finds the common denominator.

jokes.question: Why did the equal simplify the equation?
jokes.answer: It felt it was dragging on too long.

jokes.question: Why don't mathematicians argue?
jokes.answer: Because they always agree on the terms.

jokes.question: Why is the number six afraid of seven?
Why did the fraction go on vacation?
Why did the linear equation meet the quadratic?
Why was the math book sad?
Why didn't the antiderivative do well at the party?
Why was the obtuse angle always so frustrated?
Why do plants hate math?
jokes.answer: Because it gives them square roots.

jokes.question: Why was the calculus teacher so good at gardening?
jokes.answer: Because he knew the derivatives of all the plants.

jokes.question: Why did the two 4s skip lunch?
Why was the math lecture so long?
jokes.answer: The professor kept going off on a tangent.

jokes.question: Why is an electron never lonely?
jokes.answer: Because it always seeks a pair.

jokes.question: Why does the chemist need a break?
Why don't astronauts get together?
Why can't you trust a quark?
Why is a microbiologist never lost in conditions?
jokes.answer: Because they always have a control experiment on hand.

jokes.question: Why is the astronomer always in trend?
jokes.answer: Because they follow all the new flares in the sky.

jokes.question: Why can't you trust bacteria?
Why did the geologist go on a hike?
Why did the photon check a suitcase at the airport?
Why do biologists look forward to casual Fridays?
Why was the physics book always calm?
jokes.answer: Because it had so many solutions.

jokes.question: Why did the scientist take out his doorbell?
jokes.answer: Because he wanted to win the no-bell prize.

jokes.question: Why are chemists excellent for solving problems?
Why does the server never laugh?
jokes.answer: Because it is busy processing data.

jokes.question: Why is the keyboard always in the spotlight?
jokes.answer: Because all of its keys are exposed.

jokes.question: Why was the computer cold?
Why did the smartphone go to school?
jokes.answer: It wanted to improve its connections.

jokes.question: Why don't robots ever get scared?
jokes.answer: Because they have nerves of steel.

jokes.question: Why was the computer tired when it got home?
jokes.answer: It had too many bytes during the day.

jokes.question: Why did the tech company hire a gardener?
Why do programmers prefer dark mode?
